short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EaselQA Web plugin to record testcases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EaselQA is the only open source end to end test automation tool. Web plugin uses advance element locators and computer vision to efficiently manage the web element locators.
